mapper.select: SELECT * FROM test_records GROUP BY class_id, test_id ORDER BY class_id

SELECT r.class_name className, r.test_name testName, r.score score, u.username username FROM test_records r INNER JOIN userinfo u ON r.user_id = u.id WHERE r.test_id = #{testId} AND r.class_id = #{classId} ORDER BY r.score DESC;
